item.title: Help Me Please (Really Now If You Only Great Coder)
item.dc:creator: @ameer122 ameer122
item.description:
@ameer122 wrote:

i mean when i click in attatck (who is in stats) show me this not commands

i have found this in weapon halnder

/*[) ----- Attack ----- (]*/ if (CLAttack > getLevelForXP(playerXP[0]) || playerRights <= 1) { if (server.mysql.SQLCheckMember(playerName) || CLMembers == 0) { sendMessage("You need "+CLAttack+" "+statName[playerAttack]+" to equip this item."); GoFalse = true; } else if(CLMembers == 1 && !server.mysql.SQLCheckMember(playerName)) { sendMessage("You need to be a member to equip this item."); GoFalse = true; } } /*[) ----- Strength----- (]*/ if (CLStrength > getLevelForXP(playerXP[2]) || playerRights <= 1) { if (server.mysql.SQLCheckMember(playerName) || CLMembers == 0) { sendMessage("You need "+CLStrength+" "+statName[playerStrength]+" to equip this item."); GoFalse = true; } else if(CLMembers == 1 && !server.mysql.SQLCheckMember(playerName)) { sendMessage("You need to be a member to equip this item."); GoFalse = true; } } /*[) ----- Defence ----- (]*/ if (CLDefence > getLevelForXP(playerXP[1]) || playerRights <= 1) { if (server.mysql.SQLCheckMember(playerName) || CLMembers == 0) { sendMessage("You need "+CLDefence+" "+statName[playerDefence]+" to equip this item."); GoFalse = true; } else if(CLMembers == 1 && !server.mysql.SQLCheckMember(playerName)) { sendMessage("You need to be a member to equip this item."); GoFalse = true; } } /*[) ----- Ranged ----- (]*/ if (CLRanged > getLevelForXP(playerXP[4])) { if (server.mysql.SQLCheckMember(playerName) || CLMembers == 0) { sendMessage("You need "+CLRanged+" "+statName[playerRanged]+" to equip this item."); GoFalse = true; } else if(CLMembers == 1 && !server.mysql.SQLCheckMember(playerName)) { sendMessage("You need to be a member to equip this item."); GoFalse = true; } } /*[) ----- Prayer ----- (]*/ if (CLPrayer > getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]) || playerRights <= 1) { if (server.mysql.SQLCheckMember(playerName) || CLMembers == 0) { sendMessage("You need "+CLCLPrayer+" "+statName[playerCLPrayer]+" to equip this item."); GoFalse = true; } else if(CLMembers == 1 && !server.mysql.SQLCheckMember(playerName)) { sendMessage("You need to be a member to equip this item."); GoFalse = true; } } /*[) ----- Magic ----- (]*/ if (CLMagic > getLevelForXP(playerXP[6]) || playerRights <= 1) { if (server.mysql.SQLCheckMember(playerName) || CLMembers == 0) { sendMessage("You need "+CLMagic+" "+statName[playerMagic]+" to equip this item."); GoFalse = true; } else if(CLMembers == 1 && !server.mysql.SQLCheckMember(playerName)) { sendMessage("You need to be a member to equip this item."); GoFalse = true; } } /*[) ----- Runecraft ----- (]*/ if (CLRunecraft > getLevelForXP(playerXP[20]) || playerRights <= 1) { if (server.mysql.SQLCheckMember(playerName) || CLMembers == 0) { sendMessage("You need "+CLRunecraft+" "+statName[playerRunecraft]+" to equip this item."); GoFalse = true; } else if(CLMembers == 1 && !server.mysql.SQLCheckMember(playerName)) { sendMessage("You need to be a member to equip this item."); GoFalse = true; } } /*[) ----- Hitpoints ----- (]*/ if (CLHitpoints > getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]) || playerRights <= 1) { if (server.mysql.SQLCheckMember(playerName) || CLMembers == 0) { sendMessage("You need "+CLHitpoints+" "+statName[playerHitpoints]+" to equip this item."); GoFalse = true; } else if(CLMembers == 1 && !server.mysql.SQLCheckMember(playerName)) { sendMessage("You need to be a member to equip this item."); GoFalse = true; } } /*[) ----- Agility ----- (]*/ if (CLAgility > getLevelForXP(playerXP[16]) || playerRights <= 1) { if (server.mysql.SQLCheckMember(playerName) || CLMembers == 0) { sendMessage("You need "+CLAgility+" "+statName[playerAgility]+" to equip this item."); GoFalse = true; } else if(CLMembers == 1 && !server.mysql.SQLCheckMember(playerName)) { sendMessage("You need to be a member to equip this item."); GoFalse = true; } } /*[) ----- Herblore ----- (]*/ if (CLHerblore > getLevelForXP(playerXP[15]) || playerRights <= 1) { if (server.mysql.SQLCheckMember(playerName) || CLMembers == 0) { sendMessage("You need "+CLHerblore+" "+statName[playerHerblore]+" to equip this item."); GoFalse = true; } else if(CLMembers == 1 && !server.mysql.SQLCheckMember(playerName)) { sendMessage("You need to be a member to equip this item."); GoFalse = true; } } /*[) ----- Thieving ----- (]*/ if (CLThieving > getLevelForXP(playerXP[17]) || playerRights <= 1) { if (server.mysql.SQLCheckMember(playerName) || CLMembers == 0) { sendMessage("You need "+CLThieving+" "+statName[playerThieving]+" to equip this item."); GoFalse = true; } else if(CLMembers == 1 && !server.mysql.SQLCheckMember(playerName)) { sendMessage("You need to be a member to equip this item."); GoFalse = true; } } /*[) ----- Crafting ----- (]*/ if (CLCrafting > getLevelForXP(playerXP[12]) || playerRights <= 1) { if (server.mysql.SQLCheckMember(playerName) || CLMembers == 0) { sendMessage("You need "+CLCrafting+" "+statName[playerCrafting]+" to equip this item."); GoFalse = true; } else if(CLMembers == 1 && !server.mysql.SQLCheckMember(playerName)) { sendMessage("You need to be a member to equip this item."); GoFalse = true; } } /*[) ----- Fletching ----- (]*/ if (CLFletching > getLevelForXP(playerXP[9]) || playerRights <= 1) { if (server.mysql.SQLCheckMember(playerName) || CLMembers == 0) { sendMessage("You need "+CLFletching+" "+statName[playerFletching]+" to equip this item."); GoFalse = true; } else if(CLMembers == 1 && !server.mysql.SQLCheckMember(playerName)) { sendMessage("You need to be a member to equip this item."); GoFalse = true; } } /*[) ----- Slayer ----- (]*/ if (CLSlayer > getLevelForXP(playerXP[18]) || playerRights <= 1) { if (server.mysql.SQLCheckMember(playerName) || CLMembers == 0) { sendMessage("You need "+CLSlayer+" "+statName[playerSlayer]+" to equip this item."); GoFalse = true; } else if(CLMembers == 1 && !server.mysql.SQLCheckMember(playerName)) { sendMessage("You need to be a member to equip this item."); GoFalse = true; } } /*[) ----- Mining ----- (]*/ if (CLMining > getLevelForXP(playerXP[14]) || playerRights <= 1) { if (server.mysql.SQLCheckMember(playerName) || CLMembers == 0) { sendMessage("You need "+CLMining+" "+statName[playerMining]+" to equip this item."); GoFalse = true; } else if(CLMembers == 1 && !server.mysql.SQLCheckMember(playerName)) { sendMessage("You need to be a member to equip this item."); GoFalse = true; } } /*[) ----- Smithing ----- (]*/ if (CLSmithing > getLevelForXP(playerXP[13]) || playerRights <= 1) { if (server.mysql.SQLCheckMember(playerName) || CLMembers == 0) { sendMessage("You need "+CLSmithing+" "+statName[playerSmithing]+" to equip this item."); GoFalse = true; } else if(CLMembers == 1 && !server.mysql.SQLCheckMember(playerName)) { sendMessage("You need to be a member to equip this item."); GoFalse = true; } } /*[) ----- Fishing ----- (]*/ if (CLFishing > getLevelForXP(playerXP[10]) || playerRights <= 1) { if (server.mysql.SQLCheckMember(playerName) || CLMembers == 0) { sendMessage("You need "+CLFishing+" "+statName[playerFishing]+" to equip this item."); GoFalse = true; } else if(CLMembers == 1 && !server.mysql.SQLCheckMember(playerName)) { sendMessage("You need to be a member to equip this item."); GoFalse = true; } } /*[) ----- Cooking ----- (]*/ if (CLCooking > getLevelForXP(playerXP[7]) || playerRights <= 1) { if (server.mysql.SQLCheckMember(playerName) || CLMembers == 0) { sendMessage("You need "+CLCooking+" "+statName[playerCooking]+" to equip this item."); GoFalse = true; } else if(CLMembers == 1 && !server.mysql.SQLCheckMember(playerName)) { sendMessage("You need to be a member to equip this item."); GoFalse = true; } } /*[) ----- Firemaking ----- (]*/ if (CLFiremaking > getLevelForXP(playerXP[11]) || playerRights <= 1) { if (server.mysql.SQLCheckMember(playerName) || CLMembers == 0) { sendMessage("You need "+CLFiremaking+" "+statName[playerFiremaking]+" to equip this item."); GoFalse = true; } else if(CLMembers == 1 && !server.mysql.SQLCheckMember(playerName)) { sendMessage("You need to be a member to equip this item."); GoFalse = true; } } /*[) ----- Woodcutting ----- (]*/ if (CLWoodcutting > getLevelForXP(playerXP[8]) || playerRights <= 1) { if (server.mysql.SQLCheckMember(playerName) || CLMembers == 0) { sendMessage("You need "+CLWoodcutting+" "+statName[playerWoodcutting]+" to equip this item."); GoFalse = true; } else if(CLMembers == 1 && !server.mysql.SQLCheckMember(playerName)) { sendMessage("You need to be a member to equip this item."); GoFalse = true; } } /*[) ----- Farming ----- (]*/ if (CLFarming > getLevelForXP(playerXP[19]) || playerRights <= 1) { if (server.mysql.SQLCheckMember(playerName) || CLMembers == 0) { sendMessage("You need "+CLFarming+" "+statName[playerFarming]+" to equip this item."); GoFalse = true; } else if(CLMembers == 1 && !server.mysql.SQLCheckMember(playerName)) { sendMessage("You need to be a member to equip this item."); GoFalse = true; } }

item.title: Help Me Please (Really Now If You Only Great Coder)
item.dc:creator: @Nameme123 Nameme123
item.description:
@Nameme123 wrote:

Well if you don’t know how to add it… Then I suppose you add it to commandhandler. But if you don’t have a command handler then I don’t really know.

I’ve made codes for commands before and added them but I’m not sure where I added them.

-client.java
-server.java

If those don’t work then if you have a File Searcher (Not the original ‘Search.’ The one that is a .jar file.) and enter: if(command
it will come up with the code and the file that it is located in.
That should work.

-Nameme123

Read full topic
item.source: Help Me Please (Really Now If You Only Great Coder)

item.title: Help Me Please (Really Now If You Only Great Coder)
item.dc:creator: @ameer122 ameer122
item.description:
@ameer122 wrote:

i wana make when i click in a skill

like attack show me the guide
i have wrote all the guide but i dont know how to it

if i click in attack it show me this guide

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("Mele") && (playerRights >= 0)) { String name = command.substring(5); sendQuest("@blu@ Mele Guide.", 8144); //Title clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("@red@Att,Str,Def Guide", 8146); sendQuest("To start training your melee skills you have to", 8147); sendQuest("Fight with npcs or players", 8148); sendQuest("You train your attack level with Accurate attack styles.", 8149); sendQuest("Agressive attack styles will train your strength level.", 8150); sendQuest("The Defensive attack styles train your defence level.", 8151); sendQuest("If You Wana to train your attack , strenght and your defence", 8152); sendQuest("level together then you should use Controlled attack styles.", 8153); sendQuest("", 8154); sendQuest("A goood training Place to start is east of barbarian village", 8155); sendQuest("Kill the weak goblins", 8156); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); }
